Title: Kahaani
Writer: Sujoy Ghosh (dialogue), Sujoy Ghosh (screenplay), Sujoy Ghosh (story), Advaita Kala (story), Suresh Nair (additional screenplay), Ritesh Shah (dialogue), Sutapa Sikdar (dialogue), Nikhil Vyas (additional screenplay)
Actors: Vidya Balan, Parambrata Chattopadhyay, Indraneil Sengupta, Nawazuddin Siddiqui
Plot: A pregnant woman's search for her missing husband takes her from London to Kolkata, but everyone she questions denies having ever met him.
